ImyaTweaks.Title: Features of Hacienda Overhaul: Policies
ImyaTweaks.Description: Adjust the features of the module, concerning the exchange of normal Hacienda Decrees with custom ones.

ImyaExpose.Description: Replaces the first Hacienda Policy with the custom made.
This value sets the attractivness amount required to unlock this Hacienda Policy.
Replaces the second Hacienda Policy with the custom made.
This value sets the attractivness amount required to unlock this Hacienda Policy.
Replaces the third Hacienda Policy with the custom made.
This value sets the attractivness amount required to unlock this Hacienda Policy.
Replaces the fourth Hacienda Policy with the custom made.
This value sets the attractivness amount required to unlock this Hacienda Policy.
Production time of the Hacienda Grape Farm [in seconds]. The transporter range is not affected by this change.
Storage Amount of the Hacienda Grape Farm [in tons]
Replaces the fifth Hacienda Policy with the custom made.
This value sets the attractivness amount required to unlock this Hacienda Policy.
